segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing, the boy is standing on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for the cookie jar, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl standing nearby, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so expectant, like she's done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the open cabinet doors, they frame the boy like he's on stage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really be paying more attention to the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how often they do this when she's not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the plate in the boy's hand, he's trying to catch cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall, that stool looks really unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR
